full_title: run for the hills by Tate McRae
title: run for the hills

description.plain:
“run for the hills” is the third single of Tate McRae’s sophomore album. In the song Tate talks about the feeling to have a deep desire to always be close to her lover. Similar to the theme of the album, Tate talks about how in the moment she is so deeply in love that her entire world becomes her and her lover.

The song was first teased on November 21, 2023 on Tate McRae’s TikTok account.

embed_content: Read “run for the hills” by Tate McRae on Genius
